content.raw:
example plugin sdf elements after editing and saving vehicle model more than once:

~~~
    <plugin name='simple_connections' filename='libSimpleConnectionsPlugin.so'>
      <connection>
        <source>battery_pack</source>
        <source_port>positive</source_port>
        <target>motor</target>
        <target_port>connector0</target_port>
      </connection>
      <connection>
        <source>motor</source>
        <source_port>connector1</source_port>
        <target>battery_pack</target>
        <target_port>negative</target_port>
      </connection>
    </plugin>
    <plugin name='simple_connections' filename='libSimpleConnectionsPlugin.so'>
      <connection>
        <source>battery_pack</source>
        <source_port>positive</source_port>
        <target>motor</target>
        <target_port>connector0</target_port>
      </connection>
      <connection>
        <source>motor</source>
        <source_port>connector1</source_port>
        <target>battery_pack</target>
        <target_port>negative</target_port>
      </connection>
    </plugin>
~~~

@chapulina
